snippet: SCHWARTZ--Howard Stuart, on January 13, 2016 at the age of 75. Beloved husband of Leslie and the late Gail. Dear father of Jeff and Laura (Lisa). Loving stepfather of Aimee (Michael) and Charles (Kathleen). Adoring grandfather of Emma, Noah, Caitlyn, Mia, Aidan, Christopher and Elizabeth. Donations in his name may be made to The American Heart Association. Services today, 11:15, at "The Riverside" 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Howard Stuart, on January 13, 2016 at the age of 75. Beloved husband of Leslie and the late Gail. Dear father of Jeff and Laura (Lisa). headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHWARTZ, HOWARD STUART
